title: Anyone out there have a T206 Hindu Gibson for sale?
author: cdn_collector

posts.post_title: Anyone out there have a T206 Hindu Gibson for sale?
posts.post_content:
Evening Folks,

   I'm pretty sure this thread is going to fall into oblivion without any T206 Hindu Gibson cards surfacing for sale, but just in case this post can yield a lightning strike, I'm throwing it out there.

Some time ago I assembled a near-complete run of T206 Gibson cards, but stopped short of scoring a Hindu.  I know they exist.  I'm going to take another run at this run of cards, but this time I'm going to start with the Hindu.

So if you have one that you're willing to sell or trade, drop me an email and hopefully we can work something out.

Regards,

Richard.
[url]richard@richardarmstrong.ca[/url]
i have a t206 hindu gilbert... sorry im off by 1 player

[quote name="Blunder19" post=860496]i have a t206 hindu gilbert... sorry im off by 1 player[/QUOTE]

Well that's close.  Anyone get any closer? ;)


Regards,

Richard.
